name: Mushroom Trip
description:
Disclaimer:

This game was an experiment in Unity

Don't expect Quality

There's no exit button so use Alt + F4

Story:

You're a guy...

You like mushrooms and one day you decided to eat alot of them!

you overdosed on mushrooms you passed out and had a nightmare about mushrooms man!

Now you must collect 4 blue mushrooms and find a pistol to kill mushroom man thats the only way out!

Controls:

WASD -> Move Around

Shift -> Sprint

Shoot -> LMB (Left Mouse button) 

-"One of the greatest games ever made" -IGN (or was it?)

-"My dad came back with the milk when I played this" -Someone

-"Beats every game out there" -Me

- "What the hell is this?!" - My friend
